SELECT user_favorite.id, user_favorite.user_id, user_favorite.product_id, user_favorite.created_at, product.name AS productName, product.image AS productImage FROM user_favorite LEFT JOIN product ON user_favorite.product_id = product.id
AND product.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userFavoritePageDTO.productName}, '%')
AND user_favorite.user_id = #{userFavoritePageDTO.userId}
ORDER BY user_favorite.id DESC
